You just found your Holomap! To use it, look at the inventory by pressing SHIFT or simply press TAB.
You just found your Magic Ball! When you wear your ancestral Tunic you'll be able to bounce it at your enemies!
You have found three darts.
You just found Sendell's Ball. Now you have reached a new level of magic: Red Ball. It will also enable Sendell to contact you in case of danger.
You have just found your ancestral Tunic and Sendell's Medallion. By storing Magic, it will enable you to bounce your ball at your enemies.
You just found the Pearl of Incandescent. These Pearls are highly prized by magicians. They will enable you to complete a spell.
Your neighbor just gave you a pyramid shaped key.
Jerome Baldino just gave you a part that Zoé needs to fix the car.
Empty
You have found a laser-pistol. It needs a rock crystal to work properly.
You just seized the emperor's sword. Now you can face the hussars guarding the Emperor's palace.
You just found a Wannie's Glove. Use it to repell the fireballs your enemies throw at you.
You just found the Proto-Pack. Put it on and you'll fly a few inches above the ground.
You have a ferry ticket.
You just acquired a superb Nitro-Meca-Penguin. Select it in the inventory and it'll explode a few seconds later.
You just found a can of Gazogem. This fuel will allow you to get your new super jet-pack.
You just found the Ring of Dissidents. It's their identification sign, and it will allow you to be identified by all the dissidents that you meet.
You just found a flask of gallic acid. It's often used to restore ancient documents.
You just learned the ferryman's song. It will help you to get to Mosquibee Island.
You just found the customer's umbrella
You just picked up a gem.
You own the Horn of the Blue Triton, you can use it to heal yourself or someone else.
You now have a blowgun. It fires darts fast and accurately.
You have found a itinary token. You can now use an Esmer shuttle.
You just found a slice of tart!
You now own a portable radio. You can now receive calls from your friends.
You just picked a Garden Balsam plant.
You now own a Magic Slate, which allows you to keep a copy of all kinds of images.
You have found a translator. Now you'll be able to understand the Esmer language.
You just received your wizard's diploma. Plus you just earned a new level of magic: Green Ball.
You now own the Francos key fragment.
You now own the Sups key fragment.
You now own the Mosquibees key fragment.
You now own the Wannies key fragment.
You just found the key of the passage which leads to island CX.
You just bought a pick-ax. Use it to dig or detach rocks and pieces of crystal.
You just found the Francos Burgermaster's key.
You just found the Francos Burgermaster's notes. They'll help you find the Francos fragment.
You now own a protective spell.
You now own the key to Dark Monk's temple. Plus you just reached your last level of magic: Fire Ball.
You just found a memory viewer.
You just found the blowtron. Use it to shoot faster and more powerfully.
You just found a parade outfit for the wizards. It'll make you look like an old wizard.
Jerome just gave you the super-jetpack. It will allow you to reach places you couldn't get to using the proto-pack.
You just found a piece of the Crystal of Celebration. Now you can reload your laser-pistol.
You now own a laser-pistol in working condition. It gives you enough firepower to reach distant targets that your magical ball cannot reach..
You just found the Ring of Lightning! Use it to find Sendell's Ball.

The Holomap is a 3-D map system. You may use several zoom factors to determine your position on the planet. There are also arrows which can point to the location of tasks to be accomplished, after some characters have given you certain information.
You can throw the Magic Ball and make it bounce in different ways: For that, you need the Tunic since it allows you to store Magic power that the Ball consumes at each throw.
You can throw these darts at any time by selecting them in the inventory. To retrieve them, you only have to touch them.
Thanks to Sendell's Ball, you just reached your third level of magic: red ball. With its help, Sendell can come and talk to you in case of danger.

This Tunic, bequeathed by your ancestors, will help you store Magic power. Some is consumed each time you use a magical object, such as your ball. In order to use them, you must find enough Magic and carry it with you.
By dipping this pearl in the Weather Wizard's cauldron, you will be able to create a ring of lightning.
This Pyramid is a key. If you put it in the right place, it will activate a mechanism giving you access to a secret place.
After a few adjustmenta and once Zoé fits the part, the car will be ready to go.
It is the exchange currency of your planet Twinsun. It allows you to buy the articles you are interested in.
This gun shoots straight, far reaching rays. But, after each use, it needs some time to reload.
With the emperor's sword, you can now face the hussars of the imperial guard.
With this Wannie's glove, you can now touch the fire. This will allow you to throw back the fire balls that the monsters from the gas hurl at you.
It was designed by Jerome Baldino. In order to fly above water, you must approach at a low angle. Otherwise, you will sink with your Proto-Pack.
This ticket allows you to travel aboard the ferry which links Citadel Island and White Leaf Desert Island.
You can use the Nitro-Meca-Penguins by placing them in a level and unencumbered area.
After you give it to Jerome, this can of gazogem will allow your friend to turn your proto-pack into a super-jetpack.
This ring is made and worn only by the dissidents. It is their identification sign. It will allow you to be recognized as one of them and to make contact with them.
Gallic acid is used to restore ancient documents. It allows you to brighten up the areas where the ink has faded.
If you sing it at the end of the ferryman's wharf, you will see him emerge from the mist and come to offer to take you to another island.
Be careful, the devastating power of this ring consumes a great deal of Magic.
This umbrella belongs to a pharmacy customer.
The gems are commonly used by the Francos to produce gazogem. But you can use it to pay for the ferryman's services.
It lets you draw in hearts (Life points) and store them. You can then use them to treat yourself or someone else.
The Blowgun provides rapid firepower. You can reload it with small projectiles, such as berries.
The travel token allows to program the destination of an Esmer shuttle. Without it, the spacecraft cannot take off.
You don't like this tart, but you must give this slice to someone who appreciates it more than you.
This portable radio allows you to dialogue with Baldino and Zoé when they are listening and if they are not out of range.
You must bring this flower to the Rector of the School of Magic.

By using the Action command in front of a plan, a print or any other illustration, you immediately create a copy with the Magic Slate. You can consult it at any time by selecting the Slate in the inventory.
This translator allows you to understand everything said by the visitors from Space. In discreet mode, you can even spy on conversations.
Your diploma in magic has allowed you to reach the green ball level of magic.
This fragment of the Francos' key is one of the elements which will permit you to piece together the key to Dark Monk's temple.
This fragment of the Sups' key is one of the elements which will permit you to piece together the key to Dark Monk's temple.
This fragment of the Mosquibees' key is one of the elements which will permit you to piece together the key to Dark Monk's temple.
This fragment of the Wannies' key is one of the elements which will permit you to piece together the key to Dark Monk's temple.
This key will allow you to open the doors of the passage, whose entrance is in the village of the Mosquibees, and which will allow you to go up to islet CX.
This pick-ax will allow you to dig into the ground or harder materials. With it, you can now locate objects buried underground, or extract materials.
It is the key that the burgermaster lost before he was eaten by a monster from the gas. Nobody has ever used it since.
These notes contain the enigma which leads to the fragment of the Francos. They give a clue to the location where the fragment was buried is revealed.

This Tunic, bequeathed by your ancestors, now gives you protection besides storing Magic. To use the shielding spell, press Enter from the Inventory. This spell consumes some Magic, just like throwing the Ball and using several other magic objects.
You can throw the Magic Ball and have it bounce in many different ways. The green ball level allows you to inflict more damage upon your enemies.
You can throw the Magic Ball and have it bounce in many different ways. The red ball level allows you to inflict more damage upon your enemies.
You can throw the Magic Ball and have it bounce in many different ways. The fire ball level allows you to inflict more damage upon your enemies.
It is the exchange currency of planet Zeelich. With it, you can buy the articles you are interested in on planet Zeelich.

Once the four fragments are reunited, you will have the key to Dark Monk's temple. According to the prophecy, it will allow you to make the statue come out of the volcano's crater, and to open the doors of the temple built in it.
The memory viewer allows you to review the sequences which have punctuated your adventure.
With the blowtron, you now dispose of a much higher firing rate.
This parade outfit is accessible only to Twinsun's graduated wizards. It makes of you a bona fide magician.
It was put together by Jerome Baldino. It allows now you to access new locations and to follow some grades that were impracticable with the proto-pack.
This piece of the Crystal of Celebration is of unmatched purity. It will allow you to operate a pisto-Laser.
This pisto-Laser shoots horizontal rays. They will allow you to hit enemies who are at a great distance.
Be careful, the devastating power of this ring consumes a great deal of Magic.
Be careful, the devastating power of this ring consumes a great deal of Magic.
Be careful, the devastating power of this ring consumes a great deal of Magic.
This Lucky Clover Leaf gives you the benefit of an additional life.
Citadel Island.

Under Celebration.

With my eyes focused on the center of the bazaar, my back is glued to a natural parasol where I'd love to take a nap, but I must keep a sportive mood. It seems there are enough light posts and arches in the village to count the correct number of steps. Once there, the fences to my left point in the wrong direction. It's on the other side, down in the basin near the gas that my buried treasure lies.
An action/adventure game on PC CD_ROM SVGA/DirectDraw graphics
Detail-packed 3D isometric interior rendering mode.
Revolutionary true 3D texture-mapped exterior rendering mode.
Explore over 220 places on 3 different planets.
Meet over 300 fascinating characters.
Incredibly smooth real-time animation with texture mapping and lighting.
15 minutes of stunning movie sequences.
Thousands of stereo sound effects and two and a half hours of spoken dialogue.
Voices in French, English and German. (Subtitles in French, English, German, Italian and Spanish).
30 minutes of soft, enchanting music.
Laughter all the way in this storyline that will keep you amused for more than 60 hours of play.
Yes, the family will soon be larger.
Let's go to the lighthouse!
Could you help me treat my injured Dino-Fly ?
How're you doing, Dino buddy?
I'm looking for something to cure my injured Dino-fly.
OK, I'll buy it!
No, I am not interested.
OK!
10 Life points! Cool!
10 Magic points! All right!
All right Zoé, I'll take you back.
Hello?

This is the text of the ancient prophecy. It is intended for my family, in case my descendants are also called by Sendell. Hopefully, I'll never need it again. @ And that's all I've got left from the house that FunFrock razed.
I freed him!
Hey, this looks like a map. But I can't read it!
The umbrella please.
Give me my tunic back!
Errr, ... nothing. See ya.
To knock you out!
"To the glory of Dr. FunFrock.". This bust makes an excellent target.
Master, how do you explain a storm in this season?
Just looking.
To Woodbridge island.
I'm going back to Lupin-Bourg.
To the wizard's lane.
They claim to be peaceful but let's be careful, they look sort of aggressive to me.
We are ready, Master.
Hello Luc.
Hello miss.
"Dome of the Slate."
"Ruins of the old citadel."
"Beach headland."
"Lupin-Bourg."
"Ridge of the Flowers Circle."
"Cliffs of the Woodbridge."
"Lighthouse at the end of the island."
"Harbor of Citadel Island."
"Wizard's lane."
"To the lighthouse at the end of the island."
"To the Weather Wizard. "
"To the cliffs of the Woodbridge."
"Downtown."
"Access to the cliffs."
"To the harbor."
"Honey Bee"
"LBA's Theme"
"The Empire"
"When on Desert Island, visit the Temple of Bù, an eventful episode in the history of Twinsen."
"Diploma of Elementary-Weather Magic. The Wizard Bersimon has proven his talents as a master of the elements. He has reached the rank of Grand Master of sea winds and tornadoes. "

"In the secret room, in the center of the sewers, there is an enchanted globe. The Weather Wizard put it there. According to him, it has to do with the Prophecy of Sendell. I preferred to lock this room : it can be opened only with the small pyramid."
"To my future descendants: I have lent to Miss Bloop's private museum, the Medallion and the Ancestral Tunic which rightfully belong to you. Signed: Twinsen."
"Representation of our planet Twinsun, in stable orbit between 2 suns."
"I really like this image of my trusty Dino-Fly."
A portrait of me, back when I was charged with the power of Sendell...
Hey, a portrait of Sendell! They must have used my descriptions to make it.
"Cross-section of Twinsun. @ @ 1: Sendell @ @ 2: Well of Sendell @ @ 3: Temple of Bù @ @
"Personnel only."
"Vial which once contained the Clear Water. "
"Rock from the Temple of Bù."
"Book of Bù. It allows me to speak with the animals of Twinsun."
"Horn of Gawley."
Aha !, Sendell's Medallion and my Ancestral Tunic.
"Safeguard Street"
"Green Corulla Street"
Hello.
Hi.
I am looking for the lighthouse keeper.
It's locked.
Good day, Master
Aha! a sign from Sendell. They are venerated by all the wizards.
I'm staying here.
I don't have enough Kashes.
Hi kiddo!
Hello miss Bloop.
Hello Tim.
Hello Mr. Paul.
Hello neighbor.
Hello Mrs. Brune.
Hello Mr. Bazoo.
Hi Felix.
Hello Bob.
Hi Zed.
Hello little one.
Do you know where I can find Raph the lighthouse keeper ?
I don't see my buddy Dino-Fly. He must have landed a little further away.
This portrait of Zoé is magnificent.
This statue pays tribute to Zoé and me. Without her, I could have never defeated the infamous FunFrock.
So, miss, Raph is not here?
I was told to go see the healing wizard on Desert Island. He'll be able to help my Dino.
No, not yet.
Desert Island.
The island of the Dome of the Slate.
Take me back home.
The island across from the hacienda.
And nobody did anything?
But what can I do? How do I find the trail of the lost children?
What happened, miss?
Don't forget to finish the lightning potion. To do so, go to the Desert Island to find a pearl of incandescence.
Joe? What are you doing here?
Don't worry miss, I'll find the kids!
He told me the ball of Sendell would help me find the children. I've got to find it.
But how can I do that, you left on your spaceship and I don't have one.
The car's not working. Zoé said there's still a part she needs. She asked Baldino to make it for her.
Geez, the counter-clerk is as smart as ever, he never recognizes me. What's more, he always charges me admission.
I want to get back my Tunic and my Sendell's Medallion.
But I saw the keeper! He's being held prisoner inside a cave under the cliff! I've got to get him free!
I'm still looking for a cure. Don't worry, I'll find one.
Desert Island.
The Dome of the Slate.
Strange, this looks like a keyhole.
No, not yet.
No, I've got to find the school of magic first. They're the only ones who can help me cure him!
I've decided to become a wizard so that I can help Dino-Fly myself.
By graduating from magic school, I've earned this horn that I can use to treat Dino-Fly.
Could you help me find the school of magic?
All thanks to you. Without your help, Sendell and I would never have been able to push the moon back.
Most important of all, peace is restored ! !
Hi there Joe! Still having problems with your magical powers?
Hi!
You'll need a baggage check to claim anything stored here.

Ah, Mr. Twinsen. Your friend Baldino left me a crate for you. It's in the basement, a brown crate with a big label on top. Just follow the arrows, bring it back here, and I'll open it. If you need help, ask my colleagues downstairs.
Go ahead, Mr. Twinsen. It's your property, isn't it?
You again Mr. Twinsen? But I don't have anything left to give you!
He left work? Hmm! I'll bet he went to play his guitar by the cliffs again!
Get out of the way!!
Excuse him, he is a nice Grobo. You know, he only gives himself airs.
You showed up at the right time. The door at the top of the stairs is jammed. We need to find a way to go upstairs to release it and free the bell which protects your tunic.
Thank you for releasing the door, Twinsen. Use your tunic with wisdom.
By the way, don't forget that the trajectory of your magic ball changes with your behavior!
What? The lighthouse keeper? Ah, no! No, no I didn't see him!
Ah Twinsen ! Still here?
Oh Twinsen !! You look so cute as a wizard!!
Hello !
The price of admission is 15 Kashes! Interested?
Here, sir, we have a collection devoted to the great Twinsen and to the development of Magic on the planet. Don't hesitate to educate yourself!
Know, sir, that I alone have the right to press this button!! You must pay to enter!
I don't know this character!
Hey!... you know, you look like the guy in the picture!
I am not from here, you see... I don't know him.
Mr. Twinsen! Free me, quick!! I am Raph! You know, the lighthouse keeper!! I've been caught by the Tralü, he wants to turn me into a rabbibunny-melba.
Help!
Please, Mr. Twinsen, go get your fetching little costume and your magic ball. Be our hero again! Come back to save me from the Tralü. I'm scared he's gonna eat me!!

Thank you, Mr. Twinsen! I was rehearsing a new tune when this filthy Tralü chewed up my guitar. Besides, it looks like he got others before me!! Well, back to the lighthouse, otherwise I'll get in hot water.

This storm...I wanted to get rid of it but the lighthouse was closed and I can't find the keeper anywhere. Only he could help me reach the top of the building where I have the view I need to utter a conjuration. It's the only way to stop this storm that neutralizes the island. But I need the lighthouse keeper.
Please, don't touch the container on the stove. OK? It contains a terrible creature!
Hmm...er... don't mention it please, it's only... well just a kind of a small personal experiment.
Don't touch that! I 'm trying to create an enchanted ring and this pot must not boil. Once I get myself an pearl of incandescence, I 'll be able to call the lightning!
I just bumped into the keeper who was going back to the lighthouse. He told me that a true hero had just saved him from a voracious monster.
Bravo! And now, if you appreciate Great Art, let's meet at the lighthouse. You'll see what you'll see!
Ah yes! It is on Desert Island. You'll find it easely, the entry is inside the cemetery !
Follow me!
Unbelievable, this whole extratwinsunians scare. The storm I chased off has let them land here among us. The second I have less work on my hands, I'll have to go see what they're up to.
Ah! No!!
Twinsen, rush to the downtown pharmacy and find a cure for the Dino-Fly ! He has just crashed in the garden and looks injured.

"Zoé's diary @ @ Dear diary: Today, I tell you the story of the Adventure that I had with Twinsen under the dictatorship of Dr. FunFrock: @ It was long, long ago. This Dr. FunFrock, a quetch, was oppressing the populace with terrible violence thanks to the techniques of cloning and mutation, but mostly through his mastery of teleportation. His power dominated everyone! He even had the northern hemisphere evacuated in order to execute his plan. This plan consisted of a gigantic drilling operation aimed at reaching the heart of Twinsun and grabbing the magic energy of the Sendells. Without the providential intervention of Twinsen who eliminated FunFrock, this demented project would have resulted in the implosion of the planet and the destruction of the Stellar Entity living in its center. @ Twinsen had hardly practiced Magic since this "Day of Triumph", when Sendell exceptionally entrusted him with his immense Power ..." @
I am going to see the Dino-Fly, it just landed behind the house. Don't forget that you can change the perspective by pressing "ENTER".
Twinsen, what are you doing? I am counting on you to take care of the Dino-Fly, and milord is seeking adventures in the underground instead. It's beyond your control, you have to play the hero!
Not through there.
No, not through there. First Let's go over to the lighthouse and visit the Weather Wizard.
I don't know where he is. Try the lighthouse.
We are so happy you know. It's our first and it should come anytime now.
By the way, would you be kind enough to go to Baldino's? I am missing a part for the car.
Twinsen, I met that nice lady who works for Ker'aooc, the healing wizard. She said he knows how to cure the Dino-Fly. He lives on the Desert Island. You should go see him.
Gee, thanks, Twinsen! Now I'll be able to finish up the car. Oh, Baldino called recently -- he says he forgot to give you a portable radio and he wants you to come by to pick it up.
I'm worried, Twinsen. These visitors from the sky look weird to me. They act almost too friendly. And get this, I've seen some of them hide in the garbage cans.
Hello! Twinsen ! Zoé here! Come quickly to the house, some very strange things are going on!!
Ah Twinsen, you are here! It's horrible. The Esmers have kidnapped the children aboard a shuttle. Nobody knows where they are or how to find them!! You have to go look for them!
No, Baldino left a little earlier for the emerald moon, where he'd noticed something was wrong. He left the proto-pack in working order downtown at the baggage claim, where you can pick it up.
You should go to the school of magic. Now that you're a wizard, they can probably help you!
Twinsen, did you see the dean of the school of magic?
Twinsen, did you find the children's trail?
Bravo!!
Twinsen, did you find the healing wizard?
Tell me Twinsen , did you find something to cure the Dino-Fly?
Twinsen, is that it, you have become a wizard?!
Twinsen, as soon as I fix the car, I'll call you on the walkie-talkie!
By the way, did you pick up the portable radio at Baldino's?

Hello! Twinsen? Baldino here! How are you? Looks like this transmitter works! If you swing by, I have a portable radio to give you. Also, I will have the proto-pack finished soon. It will allow you to fly in complete safety. Over.

Twinsen, I am on Emerald Moon. I have uncovered a diabolical plot organized by the Esmers!! The kidnapping of the wizards and the children was only a small part of their plan. They are about to destroy our planet!!! Listen Twinsen, you must meet me!!
The Esmers have set up a base somewhere on Desert Island. Find it and steal a shuttle!! You are the only one who can save Twinsun!!!
I've got enough problems without you touching stuff...so get lost!
Ouch!
Pfew, I'm totally exhausted moving all these crates.
Hey mister! If you want, I can carry your crate up to the exit for 102 little Kashes!
Go back upstairs. You'll get your crate, I'm sending it directly to the reception!
Hi, Twinsen. With this storm, I've got lots of customers and I don't have one minute to myself.
I don't have the time, Twinsen. Ask Luc, the boss!
Thief!
Thank you!
Twinsen, you have no business being here!
What a story, those guys showing up from the Emerald Moon, what a story!
If you are lost, go back and get your holomap.
If you want Life or Magic points, you can get some from one of the vending machines on the bar.
Better ask his buddies Pat or Fab. They're upstairs. Haven't moved since it started raining.
Hello, Twinsen my friend.
Howdy kiddo! How goes it?
He said he wanted to practice a new piece on his guitar. He usually hides out on the cliffs for peace and quiet. But not this long usually.
Thanks for having freed my buddy Raph, kiddo. Without you, his goose was cooked for sure.
These "Esmers" look quite nice, they ask lots of questions though. Everything interests them.
Waiter!
Cool!! That music rocks! Don't you think?
Raph? With him and Fab, we put together a killer combo to play some funky rock'n rave! But since he didn't show at the last rehearsal, no way I can tell you where he is now!
It's great that our buddy Raph is back at the lighthouse. But the arrival of these space aliens, that's some thin-I-never-seen-before.
I sure dig those "extra-twinsunians". Their civilization is more advanced than ours, but they are still way cool.
Hey!, we need some music here!

If you go to the cellar, be [hic!]... be careful! I been there my own self... just to get in a couple snorts on the sly: well there's a [hic!] there's a hole smack in the middle. Yessir, smack in the middle! Oh, that falllll, yowza!
Darn, I had seen some pink grobos before, but green chaps from outer space, that's a first!
Waiter!

Not being from here, I find your island rather strange. I don't understand why your Weather Wizard does nothing about this storm. By the way, do you know that it's possible to search the garbage cans, the vases and the closets by standing in front of them and doing "ACTION"?
Sorry, I am not from here.
Waiter!
Sorry, but I don't have anything for a Dino-Fly.
Personally, I have nothing for your Dino-Fly, but the client said she could help you.
If you are interested in an item, stand in front of it and do "ACTION".
Don't touch my cash register!
You know, even though he is my brother, I don't give a hoot about his whereabouts, this lazy bum thinks about nothing but playing his guitar on the cliffs.
You know, since people are scared, there are only a few shops left open. The Esmers are looking for you, they even had your museum closed down!
But I have a customer who works for a healing wizard named Ker'aooc. He lives on Desert Island. According to my friend, he treats everybody for everything.

The foul weather prevents the boats from leaving the harbor. There's nothing to do, all maritime activity is paralyzed. Let me tell you, Mr. Twinsen, only the Weather Wizard could set things straight!!
You need a ticket to board the ferry, Mr. Twinsen.
What?? Very funny!! Now this good-for-nothing abandons the lighthouse right in the middle of the storm! What a shame!!
Your ticket is in order, Mr. Twinsen, you may board. Have a nice trip!
By the way, the missus was looking for you. She tells you to go see Ker'aooc, the healing wizard, on Desert island. He knows how to cure your Dino-Fly.
The Esmers have forbidden all maritime service.. There is nobody left to hop from island to island anyway. They are too scared of the Esmers.
There is still no maritime service, but I have the impression that there are less Esmers on our island.
Insert 5 Kashes if you want 10 Magic points.
Insert 5 Kashes if you want 10 Life points.
Insert 5 Kashes if you want to listen to a title:
For 3 Kashes, do you want to use the telescope?
Hi, Twinsen. Far as I'm concerned, I like it when it rains. The grass gets nicely thick. Makes it taste better.
Yeah, actually I saw him pass by a while back. He was holding his guitar, heading for the cliffs.
Since the good weather's back, my bird friends are much less on edge. Oh, and be careful, there's a weirdo hiding behind the trees.

People from the planet Twinsun, we come to you in a spirit of peace. @ Thank you for dispersing this storm which prevented us from landing. We have observed your planet for many cycles now and have decided to come and study your culture on the spot. We have traveled through Space solely with the goal of discovering your civilization.
Greetings, Twinsunian. We are your friends. We come in peace to your planet. We wish only to know you and to share our knowledge with you. @ Have trust in our friendship!
Greetings, Master. You should go to Desert Island. Towards the hacienda, near the Bald Mountain, we are organizing a little gathering for the wizards. You will probably find it interesting.
Thank you, Twinsen. Without you, who knows what would have happened to our planets.

Do not mention it. You have realized our prophecy. Our planet is once again the paradise it was at creation, you have saved Zeelich from the dictatorship that our emperor was preparing, and best of all, by preventing the impostor FunFrock from executing his plans, you have saved both our worlds!!!
Hello Twinsen!
I am updating the works of my defunct son. Certain plans here date back from the time when he rebuilt the island's network of sewers.
Here we have a very instructive map of the sewers. Before you can consult it, you must wait until I restore it. For that, I need a vial of gallic acid. Unfortunately, there's none left on the island.
Yes, that's exactly what I needed. I am going to use it on the map of the sewers.
The gallic acid has revealed a text previously invisible. It mentions a small pyramid that was in my possession. Here! It's yours!
Ah yes, the pharmacist's younger brother. No, I don't know where he is.
I'm still busy with my son's documents here. Everybody seems to be terrorized by these few costumed strangers. At my age, one has seen worse!!
Thanks again for your help, Twinsen. These maps begin to make sense. You should look at them, they talk of things that would interest you.
Hello Mr. Twinsen.
This rain, will it ever end! Between my kids who were supposed to go on a field trip and my oldest son who keeps forgetting his umbrella...I hope that they're not outside in this weather.
Personally, I don't know where he is, but go look at the pharmacy. His sister might be able to help you.
The weather's improving. Now the kids can go on their class outing.
Welcome to the Inter-islands Ferry, Mr. Twinsen!
You can board as soon as the storm is over.
Why don't you read the posters. And if you are interested in a destination, you tell me.
What can I do for you?
For 10 Kashes, wher...where do you want to go?
Last time I saw him, he was hanging around in town.
Sorry sir, our ferries do not serve that island.
If you'd care to purchase something, you just have to stand in front of it and do "ACTION".
A Nitro-Meca-Penguin costs 4 Kashes.
I heard he likes to "seek inspiration" by "The Cliffs of the Woodbridge". That place is dangerous, if half of what I've heard about the Tralü's for real. Don't go if you are unarmed.
A holomap costs 10 kashes.
Three darts cost 4 Kashes.
Don't do that, you fool, it's going to blow up!
Nobody touches the cash register!
Welcome, Mr. Twinsen!
You've seen the visitors. They are Esmers. Supposedly, they're peaceloving and just want to trade us their technology for some of the wisdom of our wizards.
Oh what a fall, I'm hurt badly. Under normal conditions, I could have taken you for a spin in the air. But this time, you will have to treat me first.
Oh! I don't know where he is. But if he'd done his job, I'd have seen his light and wouldn't have crashed.
Aahhh, thank you! I think I can fly now and take you where you want.
Where do you want to go, Twinsen?
Twinsen ! Did you see Zoé? She is looking for you everywhere! She has something very important to tell you!!
That alien jalopy's easy on the eyes, but it looks difficult to park.
I don't take anybody in the storm, I hate this weather. And why doesn't the Weather Wizard intervene, heh? By the way, did you notice that you could jump while you are running?
Mmm, it's been a while since I last saw him. Not surprising with this blasted storm!!
So, for 8 Kashes, where do I drop you?
Hang on!
I just can't believe these visitors coming from another planet, let alone just to offer us their technology! I hope they are not going to start competing with me ...
Ouch!!!!
I don't talk to nutcases, Mr. Twinsen!!
What a pain these sewers! What a stink and I still have oodles of manhole covers to update. Phew!! I have had it up to here!!
Well, I am certain he is not in the sewers, I would have seen him.
Hello.
But I have an idea how you can help your friend!
Thief!
Here's the deal. I will tell you how to treat your Dino-Fly, if you would bring back my umbrella. Use your smarts but remember that, in life, haste makes waste...
Ah you are so kind. Go see Ker'aooc the healer on my behalf on Desert Island. I work for him and, believe me, he knows tricks that would cure anything, even a Dino-Fly...
I don't know. I live on Desert Island.
I don't understand why the lighthouse is closed and turned off. What could my fiancé Raph, be doing? By the way, Mr. Twinsen, did you know you can jump over the rocks if you are trapped ?
Infortunately, he's disappeared, Mr. Twinsen! I hope he hasn't gone on another of his strolls on the cliffs! One of these days it might be nasty, with all these rumors about the Tralü...
My pretty bunny has come back, thanks to you!! Oh thank you, Mr. Twinsen!!
Ohhh...I am definitely getting too old for these acrobatics!
Now then, meet me at the School of Magic. I've got a surprise for you.
Twinsen, your performance was exemplary; here's your reward, this slate. It allows you to memorize images that you see, such as maps.
Mr. Twinsen! Could you tell me why you're following me?!
But that's my umb... Oh !!! Excuse me... I thought it was mine. Boohooo, I'm so embarrassed... I keep making mistakes...
But, Mr. Twinsen, I assure you that I don't have your tunic. Maybe you should look at home.
Help!!
Raph ? Ah yeah, he has set up a super combo with his buddies Pat and Fab. But I don't know where he is.
Not again. What do you want from me now, Mr. Twinsen?
Greetings, Twinsunian. We are your friends. We come in peace to your planet. We only wish to know you and to share our knowledge with you. @ Have trust in our friendship.

Greetings, Master. You should go to Desert Island. Towards the hacienda, near the Bald Mountain, we are organizing a little gathering for the wizards. You will certainly be interested should you choose to attend.
Greetings, Twinsunian. We are your friends. We come in peace to your planet. We only wish to know you and to share our knowledge with you. @ Have trust in our friendship.

Greetings, Master. You should go to Desert Island. Towards the hacienda, near the Bald Mountain, we are organizing a little gathering for the wizards. You will certainly be interested should you choose to attend.
Hi Mr. Twinsen!
No school for me today. I'd love to find the Tralü and do it in. 'Cause if I make the Tralü disappear, I'll become a hero and they will erect me a whole museum!!
I don't know where he is, but his buddies are at the pub "Chez Luc".
Did you see those weirdoes from the sky? Mebbe they're some of the Tralü's buddies!
Why the disguise? You scared of getting caught by the Tralü's buddies?
Waaah!!!
Say Twinsen, did you ever see that Tralü? They say it's a monster that lives in the cliffs above Lupin-Bourg. If you take a walk up there, don't forget to carry a weapon. I mean your magic ball!
I don't know him very well, but try asking around at "Chez Luc," that's his big hangout.
Hey, did you really destroy the Tralü? This monster really existed? Hail to you, may you be prosperous and may the Sendells protect your descendants!
I'd like to take the kids to the "Flowers Circle", but the weather's just too bad.
I don't know where he is, Mr. Twinsen.
Look at that, this place brings out the music in young souls. In fact, they adore Sendell.
Brute!
Hello, Mr. Twinsen!

[Sniff]...the children...we were at the "Flowers Circle" [sniff]...suddenly one of those alien ships showed up right overhead. There was this big white flash, and then...nothing. Next thing I remember, I found myself alone, the children nowhere in sight, and the ship was taking off. It's horrible, Mr. Twinsen! You have to find them! You have to!
[Sniff]...thank you, Mr. Twinsen, [sniff]...
Oh, hey, Twinsen. Did you check out my essay on my future plans? Here, I will summarize: Phase 1) Grow up. Phase 2) Become a sailor! And Phase 3) Buy a million umbrellas for my brother.
I don't know where he might be, but I've always liked him, that Raph. Once he even had me over to the lighthouse. The view was impressive!
I think after my big brother cleans your clock, you won't act like such a big shot.
" It's Sendell which makes her nest @ In the heart of the planet @ Sendell does her magic well @ But it might make your head swell @ Sendell is the prettiest @ FunFrock is a dirty beast."
Hi there, Mr. Twinsen ! Listen to our new nursery rhyme!!
" It's Sendell which makes her nest @ In the heart of the planet @ Sendell does her magic well @ But it might make your head swell @ Sendell is the prettiest @ FunFrock is a dirty beast."
Never heard it.
I'll tell my big brother, he'll beat you up while I laugh, and that'll show you!
Nice to see you, Twinsen ! This storm really chaps my hide. I just can't calm down... And you, don't forget that you can change your behavior.
Ah, he's disappeared?! Oh, well, I never really liked him! May the Tralü take him away!!
So Twinsen, this li'l monster, coming soon?
What's up with these Esmers? Couldn't they have stayed home?
Since the weather outside is horrible, the teacher said I could jump rope in the classroom. See?
Ow! My big brother's gonna take care of you.
Oh yeah, I know him, he's the one always playing his guitar!!
" It's Sendell which makes her nest @ In the heart of the planet @ Sendell does her magic well @ But it might make your head swell @ Sendell is the prettiest @ FunFrock is a dirty beast."
H'lo, Mr. Twinsen. I'm being punished 'cause I ate a whole box of chalk.
I can't help you, Mr. Twinsen.
Don't care, not at all! But my big brother, he'll avenge me.
" It's Sendell which makes her nest @ In the heart of the planet @ Sendell does her magic well @ But it might make your head swell @ Sendell is the prettiest @ FunFrock is a dirty beast."
The pharmacist, she is so pretty! I don't know what else to buy in order to see her. One day I ... I'll dare talk to her.
My eyes see no one else but the pharmacist, my heart beats for nobody but her. If I dared, I'd scale the cliffs to fetch her the music I have often heard over there.
And now, with these aliens showing up in their big fancy ships, there's no way she'll notice me, my beloved pharmacist...
Ah Twinsen, with this rain, I found plenty of mushrooms!
Last time I heard him play his guitar, he was probably on the Cliffs. I was looking for mushrooms at that time.
The Esmers should come here. It feels so good to look for mushrooms. By the way, I wouldn't try to go swimming, it gets deep very rapidly.
I had hidden in the shuttle when you left the planet of the strange people. But now, I would like to go back. We left the wizards all alone up there, and they must be getting bored stiff.
"No thanks, seems to be OK now..."
Hooooo !!!
Unused
OK by me!
I'm not interested.
I would like to treat my Dino-fly first!
Looking for a costume or Magic accessories? Well, Chedil Amiradoo has a deal that'll make your head spin. Low, low prices and after-sales service. Currently doing the rounds on your island.
"Qwelt ik M?lg'b - ~oc ~'c # %-) ~Big TsS-steel-jenr, (dulkug) hanfin tuwouah koa xdocd " ö"
Disappeared?? Master, this is grave news. I'll do all in my power to find them. Trust me!!
"Learning also means completing old problems with new methods."
"Honor roll of most recent wizard graduates: Aril van Koow, Hougo Dolphar, Carnogeel."
What should I do, Master?
Hey, Jerome.
"Visit Temple-Park. Just one step from Bald Mountain, relive a pivotal episode in Twinsun's glorious history by exploring the Temple of Bù."
"Jerome Baldino. @ Miscellaneous Gadgets Inventions."
"Von Kournil tour. @ (Island of the White Leaf Desert) "

Hello.
Hi.

Good day, Master
I don't have enough Kashes.
I am looking for the healing wizard, I must treat my Dino-Fly.
Do you happen to know where he lives?
But... the healing wizard!!
I'm trying to find the school of magic.
Do you know where to find the school of magic?
Did you see a wizard walk this way recently?
Do you know where the wizards are?
"Honor roll of most recent wizard graduates: Aril van Koow, Hougo Dolphar, Carnogeel, Twinsen."
Hello?
Master, the children of Twinsun have been kidnapped by the Esmers. Can you help? Maybe a spell to help us know where they were taken?
Where could I find it?
I read a message from the Weather Wizard. He needs a pearl of incandescence to finish his lightning spell. Where can I get one?
Master, I found a strange pearl in a cave, not far from Port-Ludo.
Citadel Island.
The island of the Dome of the Slate.
I'm staying here.
The island across from the Hacienda.
The oasis in the desert.
I don't know what Jerome's cooking up, but there's a demonic machine under there.
It seems Baldino is working on the proto-pack, maybe he's trying to improve it?
Hmmm,. these must be the plans for the machine that was hidden under that tarp. Baldino must have used it to get to Emerald Moon.
You are at Temple Park, the ancient site of the Temple of Bù.
"You are at the Hacienda del Monte-Pelado."
I happen to be looking for him.
Do you know where the wizards could be?
Where are you taking me, Moya?
I didn't know about this cave.
Citadel Island.
The Dome of the Slate.
I'm staying here.
Another tourist minibus. Man, that Temple of Bù really packs 'em in!
Aha! a sign from Sendell. They are venerated by all the wizards.
No, not yet.
No, I have to find the school of magic.
By passing the school's magic tests, I've gotten this horn to help me treat Dino-Fly.
I've decided to become a wizard so that I can treat Dino-Fly myself.
He gave it to me already. I'll bring it over to you.
They claim to be peaceful... but let's be careful, they look sort of aggressive to me.
Master, I figured out why the wizards disappeared. The Esmers invited them over to their planet for some kind of cultural and scientific exchange. I wonder what that's all about...
ER ioergouerg - erioufmqer o-u tu zejkhze jkhqdsqdsl iklds klqdfjn !!
OFFICIAL NOTICE ... all shuttles going to the moon base... new password... without which the soldiers will intervene... operation GREEN MOON !!
There's a piece missing here, something disc-shaped. I guess it allows the shuttle to take off.
Hello? Twinsen? That's it, I fixed the car... You should give it a whirl... I'm bringing it to Desert Island...
Twinsen, if you want to try out the car, just go to the racetrack or the desert. As long as I'm here, I'm going to catch up on a little shopping. I'll meet you back at the house.
Twinsen, Did you find the healing wizard?
Well Twinsen , did you find something to treat the Dino-Fly?
By the way, could you ask Baldino for the car-part he promised me?
I'm worried sick, Twinsen. These space visitors look pretty spooky, and their niceness seems...I don't know, phony? Did I mention I've seen some of them hiding in garbage cans?
Here! Here's the part that Zoé needs for your car.
Here, this is that portable radio I forgot to give you. Sorry about the mixup, but I think you'll agree it was worth waiting for!
Hello, Twinsen.

I could've called it an "integrated super dynamo circuitry mechanism" but I decided to go with "portable radio". A little catchier, huh? Incidentally, I'll let you know when the Proto-Pack is ready, it'll let you fly around in complete safety.
In spite of my powerful telescope, I saw only a couple of flying saucers pass behind the Moon. The Esmers must live on the hidden side.
Good day, Master, but... is that you Twinsen? You look terrific as a wizard, congratulations.
I never realized there was an actual School of Magic! I guess I should get out of my shop more often.
I don't know where they are, Twinsen.
You need a ticket to board the ferry there, Mr. Twinsen.
Your ticket's in order, Mr. Twinsen, you may board. Have a nice trip!
You may board, Master.
"Do you want to use the telescope for 2 Kashes?"
Now that the clouds are gone, I can finally enjoy our twin sunshine. You know, I heard there's an oasis in the desert where there's this giant turtle. I'd love to go there...
A School of Magic? Do you think they might need an assistant?
No, I fell asleep in the sun, I didn't see any wizard.
Where do you want to go, Twinsen?
You know, I wonder if they might have brought her around, actually...What with all the wizards and Esmers hanging around the Hacienda these days...

I love these visitors from the sky. After the sewers of Citadel Island, I was to repaint the steambath. But, to celebrate their arrival, they bought plenty of drinks!!! Not only for me, but also for the wizards who drop in here.
Well well! Hello, mister Twinsen!
Yep!
For sure. Carousing with a bunch of Esmers...By the way, I wonder where they all went.
Sorry, but I've forbidden roof access since my colleague from Citadel Island had legal issues with a customer who took a bad dive in the cellar of his bar!
Well, what've you learned?
Hello, sir.
Out, quick!
For some time now, I've watched 'em pass through my establishment. They all hang around the patio or the steambath. Go take a look.

These Esmers are pretty chummy, buying drinks for everybody. They even buy them for the wizards. I still keep an eye on the women's steambath, though... The first one who goes in there will have to deal with me!!
It's depressing. There's nobody left, so obviously business is down. Then the Esmers come and shut my Turkish bath down. I don't get it!
Unbelievable, the Esmers think they own the place. Their space shuttles come and go through Bald Mountain, it's like they have an anthill underneath!!
Ah no, I didn't even know there was one on this island!

There is a top secret exchange program, currently reserved for the wizards. Come discover our science and civilization, and show us your Magic in return. You'll get rich in knowledge and experience. Don't mention it to your School of Magic yet, it's too early ... they would not understand.
Are you ready to come and spend some time on our planet?
Greetings, Twinsunian. We are your friends. We come in peace to your planet. We only wish to know you and to share our knowledge with you. @ Have trust in our friendship!
My master often goes to get sand roses for me. I love munching them. They're so crunchy!
I don't know Twinsen, I don't live here. I was just imported.
I saw one go by a while ago. I think he was looking for sand roses.
Howdy.
Phew, it's hot but it feels so wonderful!
A School of Magic? Is that for real? At any rate, it's not here. I come here everyday, I should know.
I've seen some pass by, quite a few frankly. But they all disappear before I can figure out where they're going.
Ah thank you. I don't need it anymore, but it was kind of you to bring it back.
You can borrow this vial, I don't think Master Ker'aooc has much use for it.
Only the wizards and the initiated know her whereabouts. All I know is that she went into hiding somewhere on the island.
All I know is that the wizard Ker'aooc has gone on a trip with some of his colleagues. It's the Esmers who invited him!!
Hello sir.
Oh, that's you! Hi!
I am a little worried, you know. Since he left, Wizard Ker'aooc has not sent any sign of life. I don't like what's going on, this is not his habit.
I hope that the Wizard Ker'aooc will come back soon. I don't feel safe with all these Esmers patrolling the streets.
I'm sorry that the healer Ker'aooc is away. When he'll be back is anyone's guess. If it's an emergency, try the School of Magic.

Your reputation has hopped from island to island to reach me, Twinsen. You are the hero of this planet and you must know that the Esmers invite the wizards to come and study their planet of origin. Watch out, there's something fishy.
It's in the desert. The entrance is in a cemetery to scare off strangers.
Whoever wants to know has to go and see! Now, you must fulfill your destiny, my young hero.
Hello to you, Twinsen !
For some time now, I've been observing inexplicable goings-on here. But it's too soon to be sure.
Hi Twinsen. If you want to see Moya the turtle, you may find her at the small oasis or on the other side of the harbor. To call her, just ring the bell.
Sorry, can't help you. The only story about magic that I know is the one about a rabbibunny that got turned into a shell!
The visitors who come from the sky are weird. I heard them invite some wizards to their planet.
The aliens have finally shown their true faces. Everybody's terrified of them.
My friends the moles told me that all the Esmers were gathering underground.
My dear sir, my goods are only available to fully licensed wizards.

Ah, you must be Twinsen. Congratulations for passing your examination. If you want a magician's tunic it'll only cost you 50 kashes. We'll throw in a false beard to make you look like an old magician. Interested?
Now that you are a wizard, I can sell you some orange powder. It costs 10 Kashes, and will recharge you in Magic and Life Points.
Hey!! You nuts?
Hello!
I know where it is, but I don't have the right to tell you.
I saw Ker'aooc pass by a while back. Told me the Esmers had invited him...someplace or other. Regardless, he was going to the Hacienda.
Welcome, Twinsen. I'd be honored to have you study with us. But even though you once saved our world, you'll still have to pass the same tests as the other students.
Do you wish to join our school?
Inscription fee is 120 Kashes. Are you ready to start right away?
You'll obtain the power to heal by passing one of the tests of wizardry. But first you have to enroll. Upon graduation, you get an additional level of magic!
You are now a member of our school.
To become a wizard, you must first pass 3 tests, in any order you wish.
You can bring me the result of each test at your leisure, but I will give you your wizard's diploma and your new level of magic only after you succeed in all 3 tests!!
Once you pass through this door, you will have to be both fast and accurate. Stand in the middle of the room and, with the help of your ball, reverse all the magic symbols.
Try again, Twinsen.
Mmm, I love the smell of Garden Balsam. Anyway, in exchange for the flower, here's the Horn of the Blue Triton. It'll make you a Healer.
You still have two tests to pass.
You still have one test to pass before you become a wizard.
Bravo Twinsen, you have earned this blowgun. It provides accurate and rapid shots.

Bravo Twinsen. You now bear the title of wizard. @ I don't have any spare wizard's parade tunics left. But there is a peddler on the island. I'll contact him and ask him to give you one. Go find him. Also, let your beard grow.

Listen to me, I must inform you of some very concerning news. Almost all the wizards of Twinsun have disappeared, and no one knows where they are. They must be found, and you are the only one who can accomplish this noble task. The school is counting on you Twinsen!
You have to find a peddler who lives on this island. I advised him to provide you with a hat and your wizard's parade tunic.
Ah, only the wizards are able to read this.
That's strange that the school does not know... I don't like it. Without wizards, Twinsun is not safe. You must go find them, Twinsen!!
To practice for your Blowgun Test, simply go through this door at the back of this room. You'll then have a limited time to shoot all the targets.
For the Test of the Slate, you must first go to the island called the Dome of the Slate, a stone's throw away from Citadel Island.

The wizards -- did you find any trace of them? The people talk of nothing but these Esmer visitors, but this mysterious disappearance is most grim. Without them, Twinsun's balance and safety are threatened!
For the Test of the Balsam, you'll have to fetch me a balsam! It's a rare plant which grows in the desert.
No. Twinsen, only you can save them. But before you confront the Esmers, you will have to reinforce your powers. And only the Ball of Sendell can accomplish this.

Shortly after FunFrock's disappearance, it was hidden on Citadel Island by the Weather Wizard. He placed it in a cage of ice which he then bound with a powerful spell. According to him, only the power of lightning is capable of freeing the ball.
There is a giant clam which lives in a marine cave in the cliffs, near Port-Ludo. This creature is host to the pearl of incandescence.
It is a pearl of incandescence. The Weather Wizard makes use of it for his lightning spell. With it, you could free the Ball of Sendell.
Have you found the Ball of Sendell? Again, all I know is that it lies on Citadel Island and that only the lightning spell can free it.
You must go your way, Twinsen. The Esmers begin to be less numerous. It looks like they are gathering by the temple of Bù, you should go take a look.
Go look at the Temple of Bù. They're discussing an old treasure still buried there.
Well done Twinsen. By taking care of this place you've enabled new plants to grow. That's smart thinking for all the magicians who come to pick Balsam will benefit.
Hello.
This Turkish bath is too hot for me! Sometimes, it's so hot that I have hallucinations... I see wizards everywhere!!!
Nah, but if they've got something to lower the temperature of this bath, I'm willing to go see them.
I don't know where it is, but it can't be that far. It's all wizards and Esmers that pass by here.
